paragraphs.body: The fruit pie was one of the ${link_0}' most popular ${link_1}. The monks sold them for one ${link_2} each and donated the profits to charity. According to Monk ${link_3}, the secret to the pie's taste was the gooey filling, and they came in four distinct colors: orange, purple, red, and yellow.
paragraphs.text: The fruit pie was one of the Air Nomads' most popular desserts. The monks sold them for one silver piece each and donated the profits to charity. According to Monk Gyatso, the secret to the pie's taste was the gooey filling, and they came in four distinct colors: orange, purple, red, and yellow.

paragraphs.body: After ${link_0} learned about his destiny as the ${link_1}, he was saddened to find that the other children did not want to play with him anymore. In an attempt to cheer up his pupil, Monk Gyatso invited Aang to "help" him with the four pies he had just baked. The two ${link_2} took a stance in front of the pies, created concentrated spheres of swirling air, and released them, sending the pies flying. The projectiles descended on the heads of the four other members of the ${link_3}, who were meditating. As soon as they hit the monks, several ${link_4} rushed in to feast on the desserts, making Aang and Gyatso laugh.
paragraphs.text: After Aang learned about his destiny as the Avatar, he was saddened to find that the other children did not want to play with him anymore. In an attempt to cheer up his pupil, Monk Gyatso invited Aang to "help" him with the four pies he had just baked. The two airbenders took a stance in front of the pies, created concentrated spheres of swirling air, and released them, sending the pies flying. The projectiles descended on the heads of the four other members of the Council of Elders, who were meditating. As soon as they hit the monks, several winged lemurs rushed in to feast on the desserts, making Aang and Gyatso laugh.

paragraphs.body: The Air Nomads used airbending in the creation of the pies, adding a quick infusion of air into the filling to make it rise and create its distinctive spiral cone shape.
paragraphs.text: The Air Nomads used airbending in the creation of the pies, adding a quick infusion of air into the filling to make it rise and create its distinctive spiral cone shape.

paragraphs.body: When asked by Professor ${link_0} what the chief agricultural product of his people was, Aang inquired as to whether or not fruit pies counted as an agricultural product.
paragraphs.text: When asked by Professor Zei what the chief agricultural product of his people was, Aang inquired as to whether or not fruit pies counted as an agricultural product.

paragraphs.body: When Aang found difficulty sleeping days before the ${link_0}, ${link_1} told him in his hallucination that he was "just a few plums short of a fruit pie."
paragraphs.text: When Aang found difficulty sleeping days before the invasion of the Fire Nation, Momo told him in his hallucination that he was "just a few plums short of a fruit pie."
